Action.description: Possible actions to execute on button press

Audience.description: User role, i.e. who will see the notice. Defaults to "all"

clientType.description: Only show the notice on specific clients. Defaults to 'all'

desktopVersion.description:
What desktop client versions does this notice apply to. 
Format: semver ranges (https://devhints.io/semver) 
Example: [">=1.2.3 < ~2.4.x"]
Example: ["<v5.19", "v5.20-v5.22"]

displayDate.description:
When to display the notice.
Examples:
"2020-03-01T00:00:00Z" - show on specified date
">= 2020-03-01T00:00:00Z" - show after specified date
"< 2020-03-01T00:00:00Z" - show before the specified date
"> 2020-03-01T00:00:00Z <= 2020-04-01T00:00:00Z" - show only between the specified dates

mobileVersion.description:
What mobile client versions does this notice apply to. 
Format: semver ranges (https://devhints.io/semver) 
Example: [">=1.2.3 < ~2.4.x"]
Example: ["<v5.19", "v5.20-v5.22"]

numberOfPosts.description: Only show the notice when server has more than specified number of posts

numberOfUsers.description: Only show the notice when server has more than specified number of users

serverConfig.description:
Map of mattermost server config paths and their values. Notice will be displayed only if the values match the target server config
Example: serverConfig: { "PluginSettings.Enable": true, "GuestAccountsSettings.Enable": false }

serverVersion.description:
What server versions does this notice apply to. 
Format: semver ranges (https://devhints.io/semver) 
Example: [">=1.2.3 < ~2.4.x"]
Example: ["<v5.19", "v5.20-v5.22"]

userConfig.description:
Map of user's settings and their values. Notice will be displayed only if the values match the viewing users' config
Example: userConfig: { "new_sidebar.disabled": true }

action.description: Optional action to perform on action button click. (defaults to closing the notice)

actionText.description: Optional override for the action button text (defaults to OK)

description.description: Notice content. Use {{Mattermost}} instead of plain text to support white-labeling. Text supports Markdown.

title.description: Notice title. Use {{Mattermost}} instead of plain text to support white-labeling. Text supports Markdown.

id.description: Unique identifier for this notice. Can be a running number. Used for storing 'viewed' state on the server.

repeatable.description: Configurable flag if the notice should reappear after itâ€™s seen and dismissed

ProductNotices.description:
List of product notices. Order is important and is used to resolve priorities.
Each notice will only be show if conditions are met.
